title: Ep. 258 A Twofer Today – Doc Eifrig and Charles Nenner
itunes:title: A Twofer Today – Doc Eifrig and Charles Nenner
description: Welcome back!We have a fantastic show for you today... with two special guests.First, Dr. David "Doc" Eifrig, editor of Retirement Millionaire, joins the podcast to talk about one of the biggest breakthroughs in cancer he has EVER seen.You'll hear him break down exactly how this technology works and tell you the best way to invest in this game-changing trend.Then, Frank brings on his second guest, legendary analyst Charles Nenner. Charles is the founder and president of the Charles Nenner Research Center.You won't want to miss his comments on gold, inflation, and interest rates.Frank also breaks down the current earning season and shares some key comments from several conference calls that he has been able to sit in on, including: Coca-Cola, Halliburton, IBM, and McDonald's to name a few...
